code: import axios from'axios';var baseURL=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;var api=axios.create({baseURL:baseURL,headers:{"Content-type":"application/json"}});export var insertMovie=function insertMovie(payload){return api.post("/movie",payload);};export var getAllMovies=function getAllMovies(){return api.get("/movies");};export var updateMovieById=function updateMovieById(id,payload){return api.put("/movie/".concat(id),payload);};export var deleteMovieById=function deleteMovieById(id){return api.delete("/movie/".concat(id));};export var getMovieById=function getMovieById(id){return api.get("/movie/".concat(id));};export var getMovieByTMDBId=function getMovieByTMDBId(id){return api.get("/movie/tmdb/".concat(id));};var apis={insertMovie:insertMovie,getAllMovies:getAllMovies,updateMovieById:updateMovieById,deleteMovieById:deleteMovieById,getMovieById:getMovieById,getMovieByTMDBId:getMovieByTMDBId};export default apis;
